website_summaries.verdict: Strong protection for the screen with tempered glass in a case that also supports wireless charging.
pros: Uses reinforced corners to protect against drops
Nice mix of rubberized and plastic parts to maximize protection while providing a sure grip
Case gives a good level of protection against scratches
Raised lip at the edge of the case prevents scratches on the screen
cons: Case doesn't have enough toughness in materials for a drop from a great height

customer_reviews.title: ... case and the zero damage tempered glass screen look great and fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: The case and the zero damage tempered glass screen look great and fit perfect! So easy to apply I recommend this to everyone who just got an IPhone 7 Plus. I will always purchase from them in the future, great quality products!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Kearns

customer_reviews.title: Love the case
customer_reviews.text: Love the case. It feels pretty thick and sturdy, but not enough to feel bulky. All the buttons work great, no issues there. My only complaint is the tempered glass screen protector that came with this set. It makes the front camera photos look hazy and disturbs the lighting. I'll probably replace it with a protector that has cut outs for the front camera. Other than that, great deal for the items provided!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just put it on my phone today. Looks great and matches my rose gold phone perfectly. Good grip and i feel like it will protect my phone well. I already have a tempered glass protector on my phone, so i didn’t use the one that came with this.
customer_reviews.author: Heath A. Kirkwood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case. The tempered glass screen protector that comes with it is awesome as well. Looks great and color matches my iphone (rose gold). I've had it about a year and dropped it. The screen protector cracked, but the phone is fine and so is case. I am online now trying to find the same type of screen protector because it protected my phone so well! Cheap and best case I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie H.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: When I was looking for a new case I was specifically looking for 3 things: protective but still cute, clear, and will work with a pop socket... and I got all 3 with this case! The rose gold bumper is really cute and the back is crystal clear, to show case my rose gold phone, and its flexible but hard enough that a pop socket sticks to it perfectly. I didn't really get it for the screen protector, but the one I had on it at the moment was cracked so I switched it, so that's good too. There's a raised lip around the camera and the screen for protection. Love everything about this!
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: Cases are still pretty limited (in my opinion) for the 7+ so I've been struggling to find the perfect one, but I think I've finally found it! This case is not only sleek and beautiful but it's practical too. My charger fits perfectly, the buttons are exposed so they're easier to press, it's not bulky, the camera has decent protection, and the bumpers wrap around the front so if my phone falls face first, it'll have a barrier to land on. I also love that it came with a screen protector. I'm returning all the other cases I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Chromy

customer_reviews.title: Mind the gap...
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble aligning the protective glass cover on my screen, even using the tool provided. I finally gave up after multiple tries. However, the real issue is that while the protective glass covers the actual screen, it does not cover the front of the phone from edge to edge & sand which under the cover as you might expect. So, when you put the back piece on the phone there is like a 1/16” gap all the way around the phone which seems like nothing but a dirt trap. I didn’t both to return it, but instead have ordered anoth case with a “built in” glass screen & attaching back cover (which I also found on Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Julie G.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had my first experience buying this case+screen protector over a year ago... I needed to put a new glass screen protector few times over last year, but I kept the same case for a long while. I am super clumsy and I drop my phone all the time, and the case and screen protector are really protecting my phone, because there’s not even a scratch anywhere. This is my favorite and the one that I always buy, I truly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Gonzalez Woiblet

customer_reviews.title: Home Run!
customer_reviews.text: This case is a home run! It's effective, low profile, and it even has a screen protector. I bought a new Rose Gold iphone, and I wanted a case that would allow the color to show through. The packaging is very unique, welcoming you to the family of Sahara Case. I do advise viewing a youtube video about installing the screen protector. I did not, and my first attempt was not completely successful, but when I let the company know about the problem, they very promptly sent me a replacement as no charge - even though it was totally my own fault. Combine all of this with such a reasonable price, and choosing Sahara Case is really a no-brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Valueshopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice case for Iphone 8 Plus -- HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case for my new Iphone 8 plus. Fits the phone very well - snug fit and it feels like it's in there safely. The rose gold color is nice with the gold phone. The glass screen cover is nice -- but I cannot get it to stay down in one corner of the screen. I have tried to lift it off and put it on again, but I have not been able to get it to stick down in this one small corner. I will now contact the company for a replacement. The touch sensitivity on the screen is good too. Good product. Update: screen protector cracked. Will try for the 60 free warranty protection. Hope it works.
customer_reviews.author: G Fri

customer_reviews.title: easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: These are great, work well and have everything you need to put them on with ease. Do a good job of protecting the face of the phone. This is my second round I have used Sahar glass. Had them on my I-8's and now I-11's. Saved the glass on the 8's so I am expecting the same good performance on the latest phone.
customer_reviews.author: cdm

customer_reviews.title: This is a great case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case. It was easy to put on and offers protection to my wife's new iPhone 7 Plus. The best part of the installation was the glass cover installation guide. It made applying the glass very easy. The case itself feels great in my hand and has a nonslip grip. Be sure to go to Sahara's web site to see installation instructions. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jimunder

customer_reviews.title: Love the rose gold color!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble kit that comes with back case, tempered glass screen cover, a frame that helps center the glass cover, an alcohol wipe, lint remover sheet, and a wipe cloth like the kind you get with eye glasses. Seems sturdy enough to protect the phone from a short drop. I'm giving it 4 stars because the glass cover doesn't cover the whole screen. It needs to be about 1/8 inch bigger all around. I mean, it's good protection but you can see the edges instead of a pristine screen. Am I being too picky? Maybe, but for the price, which is more than lots of other cases, I expect a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional.
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It's sturdy and keeps my phone safe, but it's also nice to look at, and I can actually see what my phone looks like, unlike with a lot of sturdy, pricier cases I've had in the past. I haven't actually dropped my phone yet (luckily) but the case is the perfect combination of hard plastic and shock absorbing rubber, so I feel like my phone would be safe. And the fact that it comes with a screen protector (that is nearly invisible) makes this case an incredible value. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed! The packaging was great, the instructions were detailed and extremely helpful and my iPhone 8 Plus looks beautiful. The application for the screen protector was a lot easier than other screen protectors but I did have two small bubbles and one has gone away now, so the other one might too. Overall, this product is really impressive and my product came with a 1 year warranty and 50% off another screen protector. I did find it a little weird that there was a hole in the screen protector for the front facing camera but after applying it, my picture don’t look any different. Sahara case has a lifetime customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews (only done it once or twice), but when I opened this package I was like “how much did I pay for this again?” Cause it doesn’t look like a product you can get for under $50, I’ve bought ZAGG and Apple original cases which cost me about $59 each and I would say their quality isn’t better than this one. The installation is so detailed and you can tell how thoughtful their designers are. They have tools to make sure you don’t leave any dust or particle on your screen and have your screen film stick right in the middle. I love it! I’d highly recommend this product to all of my iPhone user friends!
customer_reviews.author: cyriena

customer_reviews.title: A Protective, Affordable, Clear iPhone Case!
customer_reviews.text: The Sahara Clear Rose Case for iPhone 7 Plus is durable, affordable, doesn't cover up your phone's color (Why pick a certain color phone & then cover it up with a case?) and along with a good screen cover completely protects your phone. Easy to install with beveled cutouts for the double camera lenses, volume controls & standby buttons. This is the 2nd Sahara case I've purchased. I also purchased one for my iPhone 6 Plus so didn't hesitate to order one for my iPhone 7 Plus. I highly recommend the Sahara cases.
customer_reviews.author: BgInAz

customer_reviews.title: Saved my phone
customer_reviews.text: Yes!! I have dropped my phone a number of times. Recently, I dropped it while hiking on some rocks. It was loud. I cringed. I saw the spider web appear on my screen--but it was the protective glass that cracked, not my phone! This was a major impact and the case and glass screen protector saved my phone. I also like how slim the case is.
customer_reviews.author: MzLiberty

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely pleased with my Sahara Case and the tempered glass
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with my Sahara Case and the tempered glass. I had previously only used Otterbox Cases' and am just as pleased if not more, these are not as bulky as the Otterbox Case. I will use Sahara future
customer_reviews.author: KGB

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! They really go the extra mile to make sure you’re getting a great product. With the guide that is included, the screen protector goes on perfectly. This case is slim but yet thicker and has extra protection at the corners and around the camera. I would definitely buy this case again and will for future phones!
customer_reviews.author: Dara Quilty

customer_reviews.title: The case fits my iPhone 8 Plus perfect. It’s easy to put on and doesn’t cover ...
customer_reviews.text: The case fits my iPhone 8 Plus perfect. It’s easy to put on and doesn’t cover any of the buttons or charging port. It has the gel like feel to it, but not sticky. Definitely not a slick plastic. I have dropped my phone and found no damage. I don’t like a bully case and this works great, even fits in my back jean pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: Two days in and I must say, this is the nicest screen protector I’ve owned. It actually feels soft if that even makes sense. For the price you have my business, packaging was nice, love the “3:16” on the package. I had the 35.00 zagg from Best Buy, it only lasted 6 months. My fault when it broke, I dropped it, but it was getting scratched up anyway.
customer_reviews.author: tom tom

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all!
customer_reviews.text: Screen protector cracked when I trying to put it on. Sent them a question about return policy, and before I could recheck my email for reply, they had sent me another screen protector! No issues with second one and the case fits perfectl. Smooth, button accessibility, and durable. I have dropped my phone a couple of times from just clumsiness, the sides of the case protect your screen from cracking and the back seems to cushion the camera. My phone is gold and I purchased rose gold case, compliments well, people think my phone is rose gold.
customer_reviews.author: Tribellin

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this case
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my sister and while I can't say much about it myself, I can say that she's very happy with it. Nice look, great protection and fit for the price. By her own admission, she's had issues trying to put on screen protectors in the past but she had an easy time with this one.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: The screen protector saved my phone!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write reviews; but I absolutely needed to for this product. Recently I was walking in the woods carrying my iPhone. Well, being the clumsy person I am, I tripped on a log and fell face (and hands...i.e. iPhone) first onto the ground. My hands and knees were busted up pretty bad, and so was my iPhone, at least I thought it was. Until I removed the protector from my phone and realized there was absolutely zero damage to my phone. The protector absorbed all of the impact (picture attached)! I will absolutely be buying another one pronto so that I can ensure my phone is well protected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, elegant cover protected my phone well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this model three years ago, and bought it again because I carry my phone in the garden and it gets beat up. The case was showing the scuffs of my abuse, but my phone itself stayed pristine, despite many knocks and drops. Nice feel and finish, definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: N. DeSouza

customer_reviews.title: This is a whole kit that includes everything and it looks perfect and is every bit as quality
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved this today and have to admit after spending $50 for a case and $35 for a screen protector previously I was a little skeptical... but those are being returned and this is being used because I am actually blown away, and I never write reviews! This is a whole kit that includes everything and it looks perfect and is every bit as quality. Now I haven’t dropped it yet but you can tell by holding the products side by side they are the same weight/feel. I bought the Belkin screen protector and an otterbox cover first for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Megan P

customer_reviews.title: Protects and is long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: Have used for 2 years still in great shape, using with a screen film protector. Had numerous drops over past 2 years, only had a mild screen crack when phone fell from high shelf in garage onto concrete floor. The case combined with screen film, phone is still working with the mild crack after 6 months!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the clear case and rose color border really ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding high quality equally compares to my sons Spigen case at a much lower price. Very pleased with the clear case and rose color border really shows off the beauty of rose gold phone. Have received many compliments. Tough too, have dropped on many surfaces with no issues (knock on wood). Love it
customer_reviews.author: JoJoBeans

customer_reviews.title: Protects phone
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this purchase! The case comes with a handy tool to put the protection glass on your phone. After a year it is still working perfectly and has prevented my phone from breaking and falling into pieces a couple of times now. Even the protection glass is still intact due to the great bumpers this case have which protect the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Great looking case.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these cases as our new iPhone 7plus was to be delivered. We ordered same day delivery. We got them same day, of course we paid for the expedited service. The cases color is Clear Rose, the phone color to be installed first was black. My daughter loves the look, it was easy to install, the case is not bulky and you can enjoy the look of this beautiful phone. I am still waiting for phone number two Rose Gold on back order. I hope they will hold up to expectation. Great Looking case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely happy with this Sahara Case. I had no idea that a mail order cell phone protector could be so easy to install and look so good. I have already bragged about it to all my friends and advised them to keep Sahara Case in mind the next time they need a protector for their handheld electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: this case came with a glass protection screen. nothing ...
customer_reviews.text: this case came with a glass protection screen. nothing rose gold about it!! ONLY CAME WITH A BLACK FRONT PART AND THATS IT!! VERY DISAPOINTED!! have a brand new phone with no protection due to sending it back!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product. The directions are simple and everything is ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. The directions are simple and everything is provided that is needed to ensure a spotless, bubbleless, and exact fit. Love the screen protector placement guide. The case is perfect for showing off my rose gold phone; the color is a perfect match. The case also seems durable and fits the phone perfectly, not covering any buttons, speakers, or ports.
customer_reviews.author: April McGehee

customer_reviews.title: I-Phone 7 plus case Kit
customer_reviews.text: Very, very, nice, seems that this case will over good protection while showing off the aesthetics of your beautiful phone . Glad I took the time to review the cases and make a good choice. I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: 5ballinc

customer_reviews.title: Love my case and company
customer_reviews.text: I love my case and the company is awesome! I tried placing the glass protection screen on and it got caught on the guide case and cracked the screen. When I contacted the company to let them know what had happened, then were very helpful. They answered all my questions and sent me a new screen protector. The second one went on great without any problem. I Will be buying all of my cases/screen protectors from this company!!!
customer_reviews.author: Love to shop

customer_reviews.title: Good case--dropped the phone twice from pretty high up and ...
customer_reviews.text: Good case--dropped the phone twice from pretty high up and no breaks or cracks. The camera protector is great--took a bunch of pictures and there aren't any glares or weird effects from the sun. Tempered glass protector is nice too--responds to touch and protected the screen from cracking when I dropped it. The one criticism that I have is this: the tempered glass doesn't completely fill the body of the phone. There is about a 1/4 to 1/8 inch gap between the case and the tempered glass. I would've liked it better if the glass was larger on each of the sides so that there isn't a gap. Otherwise, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nikoletta Mendrinos

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money and time
customer_reviews.text: This, IMO, was a very good deal. It looked good on my phone, it was easy to put together, had a lot if things that came with it and does a good job. The added glass screen protector is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: F. Velez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing presentation! The screen protector aligner tool is what ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing presentation! The screen protector aligner tool is what really made this product 5 stars. The only slight annoyance was that i had to wiggle my charger plug into the port since the hole was either not lined up perfectly or may be a hairline too small. Overall, very good experience with this product!
customer_reviews.author: LaurieKate

customer_reviews.title: Simple and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love how it comes with the screen protector and even a kit to get the protector onto the screen. They really did a good job! Also, i really like the case because it’s not only sturdy but also simple and chic.
customer_reviews.author: MINJI LEE

customer_reviews.title: Love love love.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this case. It comes in a fun, package that makes it easy and fun to assemble. Not cheap plastic that’ll scratch easy, more rubbery but still durable. Color is perfect. Will buy again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I love this case!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Sahara case. I love how slim it is and the glass protector fits perfectly. I had one on my iPhone6 for a couple of years and let me tell you, I dropped it all the time!! I never had to replace the glass and when I took the case and glass off the phone looked brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Better than the expensive cases!
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this better than my $60 case I got from the Verizon store. It’s really cute and super durable. I’ve had it for several months now and it has no chips from being dropped or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: I really love this case
customer_reviews.text: I really love this case!! Having a 7plus I didn't want anything making it even bulkier than it already is. But I also need the case to protect the phone as my 18 month old granddaughter believes it's HER phone. It goes on easy and it's high quality. Nothing cheap about this case. I would buy it again and I certainly would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The screen protector was easy to put on (it comes with this handy guide ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this case before I got my iPhone 8 Plus. I had ordered my new phone and knew I needed a case, but was worried that the 7 plus cases wouldn’t fit. Turns out, this one fits perfectly! It’s also really convenient that the case already comes with a tempered glass screen protector. The screen protector was easy to put on (it comes with this handy guide that you snap on the front of the phone) and the case seems durable yet still classy. I am really impressed with this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Case TOO SMALL to fit an iPhone 7 Plus
customer_reviews.text: Received a smaller case and did not fit the iPhone 7 Plus. Not 100% positive but it could be for an iPhone 7 instead. Also, did not have any screen protector as indicated in the item description. I purchased this item in Used, Like New condition so it may be a totally different experience if purchased new. :)
customer_reviews.author: YodaMama

customer_reviews.title: Super frustrated. I took my phone out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Super frustrated. I took my phone out of the box, brand new, took the screen protector that comes with it off, but this on and there is still bubbles. The screen protector (this on) itself is dirty; not my phone. I could see it when I pulled it out of the box. Super frustrating. I was trying to save time and money but I’m just going to go to Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fair

customer_reviews.title: come with safe glass protector that did not work and ...
customer_reviews.text: come with safe glass protector that did not work and was wrong size had to make three phone calls to company before correct one was sent but they did send it and it worked perfect
customer_reviews.author: fonda  frederick

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this case
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this case! It came with a really great plastic piece to help with installing the screen protector in exactly the spot it needed to be in on the phone. The case is sturdy but sleek enough to still see the pretty color of the phone. The cost was great too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Case
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use this case on my new iPhone 8 plus, but at the last minute I decided to switch to the iPhone X so I returned the case. However, it looked like it would have been excellent protective case.
customer_reviews.author: DebJS

customer_reviews.title: Nice grip, protects the screen too!
customer_reviews.text: Has a very nice grip. Buttons are easy to operate. The phone charging port is also easily accessible. Fits perfectly around the camera. Protects the phone screen since the edges are raised. Love the case.
customer_reviews.author: hari

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow, so impressed!!! The packaging is amazing, the directions are so clear, and it comes with everything you need to protect your phone and do it right. I will definitely be ordering more cases.
customer_reviews.author: Shaby Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Screen Protector Not for IPhone 8 Plus
customer_reviews.text: The case fit fineand looked nice,however the screen protector didn’t include the camera slot for the 8 Plus. Covering the slot diminishes the quality of front facing photos, which defeats the purpose. The image in the description showed the camera slot, but was not what was received.
customer_reviews.author: Porridgepods | Nurturing Motherhood

customer_reviews.title: Alignment tool was excellent
customer_reviews.text: Easiest screen protector installation EVER! The screen alignment tool is so good, I kept it for future applications if this company stops sending them. Clear instructions, great look, and almost no need for the squeegee.
customer_reviews.author: Vbcoachc

customer_reviews.title: Comes in a nifty kit with excellent instructions
customer_reviews.text: Designed to protect my phone without too much bulk. Good value. Packaged nicely and took just 3-5 minutes to review instructions and install.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie G

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. It looks great with my phone. The customer service at Sahara Case is excellent!!!! I got a piece of dust on the tempered glass and they immediately sent me a replacement. I will definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: Wow... this case is AMAZING!!! I bought it because I needed something protective & light weight- this is both! Very sleek, protective, super cute! The case came with a screen protector, instructions on how to properly apply- totally would recommend to anyone who asks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This case is so cute and a good value! I dropped my phone face down on ...
customer_reviews.text: This case is so cute and a good value! I dropped my phone face down on a tiled floor a couple weeks after purchasing and the tempered glass got a few cracks in it. I contacted the company and they sent me a new tempered glass replacement within a few days! Great customer service! The only reason I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars is I wish it had a little bit more padding on the front edges of the phone so make sure you put both the tempered glass and the case on because the case alone won’t protect the front glass!
customer_reviews.author: Emily W

customer_reviews.title: Great case t
customer_reviews.text: The case is fine, it seems to protect the phone pretty well without being bulky, however my complaint is with the screen protector. Before I could even get it out of the wrapping the screen cracked, however the company does offer a 30 day free screen protector replacement so I guess that makes up for it. Another negative about the protector is that it covers the front facing camera which makes the pictures come out blurry. I'll stick with my Zagg screen protector...but great case!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good protective case with a strong screen protector
customer_reviews.text: Really cute case that does an amazing job at protecting your phone. The pink case goes really well with the gold iPhone 8 Plus. I also like how it comes with a screen protector with easy to install instructions. I've dropped my phone multiple times and the screen protector has yet to crack. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: This is EXACTLY what I was looking for. I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: This is EXACTLY what I was looking for. I'm so impressed with this and how it is packaged. The case itself is slim and while it is no otterbox, it definitely protected my phone during the many times that I've dropped
customer_reviews.author: Lily P

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Basically an Otterbox without paying the ridiculous price! Awesome case
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Johnston

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Super easy installation. Slim design. The edges match the phone. I am used to life proof and am waiting for the iPhone 7 plus cases to come out so I feel a whole lot better with this on as opposed to nothing. I have small children and a waterproof case seems necessary but I sure like this one!
customer_reviews.author: Iamthatis

customer_reviews.title: What I love most about this case is the look
customer_reviews.text: What I love most about this case is the look. I purchased the iPhone 7 Plus in Rose Gold. The phone is so beautiful that I didn't want to hide it in one of these heavy duty cases, so I got the SaharaCase. It's hard to believe that a case so thin can be of great protection. I guess we'll have to see if/when I drop the phone. Inevitably, it will happen, so I will update my review on how the case held up when that occurs.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvie Villeneuve

customer_reviews.title: It workds great
customer_reviews.text: This case is doing a great job protecting my iphone 8 plus.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: First I loved this case but after couple days O found some spots on the back. Not worth that price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It came with a tempered glass screen protector (just what I needed) with materials for easy application. Then the case itself is what I expected; thin, simple/classy and yet enough to protect my Phone. The only thing is that the case aligns along the back facing camera. So when you lay your phone on a flat surface (with your screen facing upwards, the surface will have contact with your camera. If that makes any sense?? So that’s the only downside. Otherwise it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: knguyen

customer_reviews.title: This is the best screen protector I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my phone last week and, if it hadn't been for the glass protector, I would have had another cracked screen. This is the best screen protector I've ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Malia

customer_reviews.title: hate the screen protector part
customer_reviews.text: The 5 star reviews have to be "paid-for" reviews, right? The screen protector is a little piece of plastic, not glass. Not tempered glass. It says there's some kind of squeeqie (sp?) but I can't find anything like that... and i got huge bubbles while trying to lay this sticky plastic thing on top of my screen. The outside case is as-advertised. I'm just disappointed in the sticky plastic that's supposed to protect my screen. going out now to buy something else. Edited to add: found the squeegee, which is a piece of plastic thinner than a guitar pick. Did not help get bubbles out at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice case!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and smoothness of this case. I love that I can use an iRing on it, and it sticks very well on the smooth back of this case.
customer_reviews.author: snowmom

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: Great case but not sure what the black bumper part is for. Doesn’t seem to fit phone. Threw screen protector away and ordered different ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kloy

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! I bought one in 2018 and it lasted me a VERY long time.(I love the clear case because I like putting pictures in the back)I recently bought another because my case had already used it’s cycle of life and was time for a new one. Love that it comes with a screen too! Way better that Walmart or bestbuy..
customer_reviews.author: Gabs

customer_reviews.title: Like case not crazy about screen protector
customer_reviews.text: I love the case it’s very pretty and seems like it will protect phone pretty well, the screen prtectector not so much first one cracked after a couple of days and no drops or anything then the second one cracked when my phone fell on the grass and I researched to find the best one this one said it can bear a lot more pressure then some others but for me it’s not holding up to its end of the bargain
customer_reviews.author: judie scoca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great case. fits my iphone 8 plus perfectly. very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed 65

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case for iPhone 8 Plus
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. It’s goes perfect with my iPhone 8 Plus gold. I like the clear pink tone to it. Like that the case came with everything I need to help protect my phone, a case and glass screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Broken Tempered Glass
customer_reviews.text: I love the case but as soon as I opened the packaging I heard the tempered glass screen protector crack. The screen protector is usable but has a crack right across. Not saying this is a horrible case, but the tempered glass is cheap. Don't make the same mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: Maddison Ashby

customer_reviews.title: Protects my phone very well
customer_reviews.text: I’d buy another one. It protects my iPhone 7+ Very well.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Directions area clear and easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Case arrived as described. Directions area clear and easy to follow . All went well and I am happy with the case so far.
customer_reviews.author: The Evaluator

customer_reviews.title: Did not save screen from fall
customer_reviews.text: The case was nice, but the phone slipped out of my hands and my screen broke. The tempered glass cover was fine but my screen had to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: C. Benner

customer_reviews.title: This was a GOOD pick!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the slim look and the color I ordered (pink/rose). Assembly was super simple. I have dropped my phone a couple times and NO DAMAGE (yay). I issue...the screen cover has a lift/bubble on the right upper area. Really jusy annoying more than anything. It will not re-adhere. Otherwise, great case choice for a slim, clear look.
customer_reviews.author: Maria G.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: This case looks nice and is not bulky. However, the rim is hard plastic, not a rubbery material, so it's slippery and I don't really feel it's going to buffer a drop. We'll see...Like the tempered glass front.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L.

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: Love the case. Fits well and isn’t bulky at all. Protects the screen and wraps over edges well. 4 stars just because we had to try the screen protector a few times to get a good, clean installation.
customer_reviews.author: TTUNicole

customer_reviews.title: IPhone 8 case review
customer_reviews.text: Installing the glass over the Iphone 8 was a bit of a challenge. It took several attempts to locate the plastic over the glass and place the glass in the right spot. The video was more helpful than the instruction card..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Phone Case
customer_reviews.text: This case is nice, fits well and looks great. I've dropped my phone a few times and it protected it well. I would buy it again and I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: LHaynes

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: 5 Star they go above and beyond every tool and product needed to keep my phone safe at an amazing price! Absolutely will buy again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: shelby

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect case very durable & still have it after a year later in perfect condition. My screen hasn’t cracked not once in this case
customer_reviews.author: Tiara

customer_reviews.title: Screen Protector Works!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve dropped my phone so many times since I’ve had this case but a couple of days ago I dropped it on an object that made impact with my screen protector and when I picked it up it was shattered but my phones screen was left unharmed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but protective
customer_reviews.text: Pretty but protective I love this case. Very pretty and feminine. Also seems to do very well with protecting my phone from scratches and falls.
customer_reviews.author: anniegiturgun

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with this product it holds up to its description!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The hard piece of the case didnt fit over the bendable part. Unable to use the hard piece.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Brim

customer_reviews.title: This makes my phone look sooooooo sleeeek 💓😂
customer_reviews.text: It is a realllllly nice case! Its not bulky but looks like it can Take a nice drop. (Hopefully lol) and the screen protector and the screen protector assistant tool helps soo much! I didnt even have To put a lot of force for the air bubbles to come out! I would definitely reccomend this product! WORTH THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Kmuiii

customer_reviews.title: Great case and tempered glass package
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this case. The alcohol swab, dust cloth, and sticker they included to clean the screen were really convenient. The plastic piece that you click on to place the tempered glass was my favorite part... the whole process took 5 minutes and the glass was perfectly lined up and super easy to apply. For the price this case is totally worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Parker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match! If you are a rose gold lover
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match! If you are a rose gold lover, this is for you. The sides of the case are the same rose gold color as your new phone, and the back is transparent. The sides perfectly camouflage any oily hand and finger smudges on the sides of your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara w. Ruvolo

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISEMENT!
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend this item because it DOES NOT fit the iPhone 8 Plus and falsely stated.
customer_reviews.author: The Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: if you're picky like me...
customer_reviews.text: i absolutely love this case. i got the rose gold one for my rose gold iphone 8plus and i honestly think it makes the phone look better. if you're a picky person, like me, and you like your phone without a case, this might just suit you. it doesn't make it look too thick or bulky AND it protected my phone because i dropped it twice already. lol. i recommend. 👌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100% order this right now
customer_reviews.text: i love this case! I have had it on my phone for about 6 months and it’s still like the day i got it. the screen protector that comes with it is awesome, there’s a small chip in mine and thankfully it wasn’t my phone that cracked!
customer_reviews.author: Addison Hennigan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect the 4.99 replacement screen
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy because my zero damage screen cracked and it is impossible to get the 4.99 replacement for the life of my phone that they promised.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Starkey

customer_reviews.title: The case itself is nice and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The case itself is nice and lightweight. It fits the iPhone 8 Plus but because the back is glass it does not look good. It looks like the back has a big water mark.I’ve used other clear cases and they haven’t had that defect. Nice case just disappointed that it doesn’t look nice on the 8 plus.
customer_reviews.author: William Lopez

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: love the feel of this case and it's beauty...however, I have some bubbles in the glass that I can not get rid of and that is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hoehn

customer_reviews.title: Worth its Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that this is an amazing kit at a great price. The case and the screen protector are amazing and we're hoping for longevity on this product. Do recommend this item, plus theirs a kit to put on the screen protector for the dummies. It's pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Luis F.

product_meta.title: Saharacase iPhone Case, Rose Gold Clear Protective Kit, compatible with 8 Plus and 7 Plus
feature_bullets: Saharacase iPhone Case, Rose Gold Clear Protective Kit, compatible with 8 Plus and 7 Plus
